mapper.select: SELECT t1.account, t1.nick_name, t3.role_name, t5.permission_name, t5.permission_url FROM ts_user AS t1 LEFT JOIN ts_user_role AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN ts_role AS t3 ON t2.role_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN ts_role_permission AS t4 ON t3.id = t4.role_id LEFT JOIN ts_permissions AS t5 ON t4.perssion_id = t5.id WHERE t1.account = #{username}
